channel.title: TILs on Dilip Kushwaha
channel.description: Recent content in TILs on Dilip Kushwaha

item.title: Syncing git repo fork with upstream
item.description: Sometimes we fork git repositories and use the forked repo in our projects. But these fork repos get outdated as the upstream repo maintainers keep pushing commits. Here I will give you few commands to sync the forked repos with upstream repository.

item.title: Binding style attribute and safestring in Ember
item.description: Many times we want to have custom styles in our ember templates which are controlled via controller/components.

item.title: Ember addon install package old & new
item.description:
Ember-cli provides addAddonsToProject api method for addon developers to install other addons using blueprints. In older versions of ember-cli(perhaps < 1.13) addAddonsToProject method doesn’t accepts array of packages but the new one does.

So here is the code to support your addon users who are using old or newer versions of ember-cli.
